about_the_game:
Explore a reimagined ancient Rome thriving in the era of industrial revolution in this fast-paced precision platformer. Master abilities like jetpacks and dashing, interact with the environment for example, through wall running, as you navigate interesting and varied levels filled with challenges and multiple pathways. Compete for the fastest times on leaderboards inside the world of a mechanized empire in ‘Roman Legacy: Speed Trials'.

Features

  • Traverse: Move, Jump, Climb, Swing, Boost, Wall run in first person using abilities and the level. Mastering execution will take dedication and skill
  • Explore: Interesting, detailed and varied environments in a unique ‘Romepunk’ style
  • Compete In Online Leaderboards: Find the fastest route using your knowledge of the abilities and levels

Planned Features To Come

  • Create: Create content for others to play! Share your creations on the Steam Workshop

Important Note:

This game is currently in early development. The features, graphics, and gameplay are subject to change(improved) as we continue to work on the game. Your feedback is invaluable to us during this process, and we appreciate your understanding and support.

short_description: Explore a reimagined ancient Rome in the industrial revolution in this fast-paced precision platformer. Master abilities like jetpacks and dashing, interact with the environment through wall running, and navigate interesting levels. Compete on leaderboards in 'Roman Legacy: Speed Trials'.
